# supportPreferred

**Type Property**

A value that indicates the app needs binary large object support.

## Declaration

```swift
static var supportPreferred: ASAuthorizationPublicKeyCredentialLargeBlobRegistrationInput { get }
```

## Using defined support values

- **supportRequired**: A value that indicates the app requires large binary object support.
